07d2c7b2-482c-4c7b-a414-0d356682554d_100.json_content:
{
  "test_cases": [
    {
      "test_case_id": "TC001",
      "test_case_name": "正常权限菜单查询",
      "api_name": "查询权限菜单信息",
      "method": "POST",
      "url": "/user/sysMenuDict/getPermMenuDict",
      "headers": {
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        "Authorization": "Bearer 1234567890"
      },
      "request_data": "{}",
      "expected_status_code": 200,
      "expected_response": {
        "code": "1",
        "message": "OK",
        "total": 0,
        "timestamp": 1625454400
      },
      "test_type": "positive",
      "priority": "high",
      "description": "验证有效认证下权限菜单查询功能",
      "preconditions": "已通过认证且具备系统菜单查询权限",
      "postconditions": "返回包含有效菜单数据的JSON响应",
      "tags": [
        "权限管理",
        "认证测试",
        "smoke"
      ]
    },
    {
      "test_case_id": "TC002",
      "test_case_name": "未认证访问接口",
      "api_name": "查询权限菜单信息",
      "method": "POST",
      "url": "/user/sysMenuDict/getPermMenuDict",
      "headers": {
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
      },
      "request_data": "{}",
      "expected_status_code": 401,
      "expected_response": {
        "code": "0",
        "message": "Unauthorized"
      },
      "test_type": "negative",
      "priority": "high",
      "description": "验证未认证用户访问接口的权限控制",
      "preconditions": "未进行任何身份认证操作",
      "postconditions": "返回401未授权响应",
      "tags": [
        "认证测试",
        "security"
      ]
    },
    {
      "test_case_id": "TC003",
      "test_case_name": "无效参数请求",
      "api_name": "查询权限菜单信息",
      "method": "POST",
      "url": "/user/sysMenuDict/getPermMenuDict",
      "headers": {
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
      },
      "request_data": "{invalid: parameter}",
      "expected_status_code": 400,
      "expected_response": {
        "code": "0",
        "message": "Invalid request format"
      },
      "test_type": "negative",
      "priority": "medium",
      "description": "验证不符合JSON规范的请求体处理",
      "preconditions": "未提供有效认证且请求体格式错误",
      "postconditions": "返回400错误响应",
      "tags": [
        "接口测试",
        "格式验证"
      ]
    },
    {
      "test_case_id": "TC004",
      "test_case_name": "分页参数测试",
      "api_name": "查询权限菜单信息",
      "method": "POST",
      "url": "/user/sysMenuDict/getPermMenuDict",
      "headers": {
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        "Authorization": "Bearer 1234567890"
      },
      "request_data": {
        "pageNum": 1,
        "pageSize": 20
      },
      "expected_status_code": 200,
      "expected_response": {
        "code": "1",
        "total": 100,
        "pageSize": 20,
        "pageNum": 1
      },
      "test_type": "boundary",
      "priority": "medium",
      "description": "验证分页参数的有效性",
      "preconditions": "已通过认证且具备系统菜单查询权限",
      "postconditions": "返回包含分页数据的响应",
      "tags": [
        "边界测试",
        "分页"
      ]
    }
  ]
}

{
  "test_cases": [
    {

      "api_name": "导出角色信息",

      "headers": {
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        "Authorization": "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9"
      },
      "request_data": "{}",
      "expected_status_code": 200,
      "expected_response": {
        "code": 200,
        "msg": "导出成功",
        "download_url": "http://example.com/download/role_data.xlsx"
      },
      "test_type": "positive",
      "priority": "high",
      "description": "验证已认证用户可正常导出角色信息",
      "preconditions": "用户已通过OAuth2.0认证并获取有效token",
      "postconditions": "系统返回包含下载链接的JSON响应",
      "tags": [
        "系统角色服务",
        "认证",
        "导出"
      ]
    },
    {
      "test_case_id": "TC002",
      "test_case_name": "导出角色信息_未认证访问",
      "api_name": "导出角色信息",
      "method": "POST",
      "url": "/user/sysRoleDict/export",
      "headers": {
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
      },
      "request_data": "{}",
      "expected_status_code": 401,
      "expected_response": {
        "code": 401,
        "msg": "未认证请求"
      },
      "test_type": "negative",
      "priority": "high",
      "description": "验证未认证用户无法访问导出接口",
      "preconditions": "用户未进行任何认证操作",
      "postconditions": "系统返回401未授权响应",
      "tags": [
        "系统角色服务",
        "认证",
        "安全"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
